title: Adventist Book Center - ABC Store
description: Bookstore and food store managed by the Seventh Day Adventist Church. The food section is large and is predominantly vegan in addition to some lacto-ovo options, organic and gluten-free options. Shop sells many frozen meals, canned goods, snack bars, natural juices, vegan cheese, Earth Balance butter, vegan ice cream, vegan marshmallow fluff, bulk staples, household cleaners, shampoos. The ABC Bookstore also distributes many natural and veg products to local supermarkets. Directions: may be difficult to find as there is no obvious signage outside the store. It is located just a short distance up the street from the Hamilton Fire Station, on the right hand side as you walk the street going uphill.
